Source code for relationships_utils.causal_inference

"""
Causal Inference
================

This module provides functions for performing 
causal inference analysis, including Granger causality tests.
"""

from statsmodels.tsa.stattools import grangercausalitytests
import pandas as pd



[docs]
def granger_causality_test(x, y, max_lag=12):
    """
    Perform Granger causality test to determine if one time series can predict another.

    Parameters:
        x (pd.Series): Time series data for the first variable.
        y (pd.Series): Time series data for the second variable.
        max_lag (int): Maximum lag to test for causality (default is 12).

    Returns:
        dict: Granger causality test results, with lags as keys and test results as values.
    """
    data = pd.concat([x, y], axis=1)
    results = grangercausalitytests(data, max_lag)
    return results
